meta.src:
schema: playbook/2
name: component_aX_9QIxpUeCbCOxuY_playbook
actions:
  Clear_Detection_Feedback_Fields:
    meta: {}
    title: Clear Detection Feedback Fields
    type: recordAction
    delay: 0
    pool: ""
    on-success: []
    on-failure: []
    on-complete: []
    publish: {}
    post: {}
    timeout: 0
    description: Clear Detection Feedback Fields
    inputSchemaReferenceId: adab0b56-fbcb-4820-9b7f-114a377f7254
    inputs:
      applicationName: ""
      applicationId:
        $:ref: $inputs.CIM_Application_Name
      trackingId: '{ $:ref: $actions.Extract_Meta_Data.result.cim_tracking_id }'
      patchValues:
        $:ref: $actions.Extract_Meta_Data.result.clear_fields_json
      appendValues: {}
      restrictions:
        users:
          operation: append
          value: []
        groups:
          operation: append
          value: []
      removeValues: {}
    recordActionType: patch
  Extract_Meta_Data:
    title: Extract Meta Data
    type: transformation
    description: Extract Meta Data
    on-success:
    - Update_CIM_on_Execution_Status: {}
    on-failure: []
    on-complete: []
    publish: {}
    transformations:
      cim_tracking_id:
        title: CIM Tracking ID
        description: ""
        display:
          functions: []
          advancedView: true
        inputs:
          expression: inputs.Record_Values.values."tracking-id"
          data:
            inputs:
              Record_Values:
                $:ref: $inputs.Record_Values
        actionType: jsonata
        next: clear_fields_json
        timeout: 0
        meta: {}
      clear_fields_json:
        title: Clear Fields JSON
        description: ""
        display:
          functions: []
          advancedView: true
        inputs:
          expression: >
            /* This block creates the JSON object required to update the Case and Incident Management record */

            {
            	"dlfa.detection-feedback-text": "",
            	"dlfa.is-detection-feedback-submitted": "False",
            	"dlfa.is-detection-feedback-empty": "False",
            	"dlfa.detection-library-tracking-id-text": "",
            	"dlfa.is-execution-in-progress": "False",
            	"dlfa.detection-library-tracking-id": ""
            }
          data: {}
        actionType: jsonata
        next: ""
        timeout: 0
        meta: {}
    entrypoint: cim_tracking_id
    meta: {}
    delay: 0
    pool: ""
    post: {}
    timeout: 0
  Update_CIM_on_Execution_Status:
    title: Update CIM on Execution Status
    type: recordAction
    description: Update CIM on Execution Status
    on-success:
    - Clear_Detection_Feedback_Fields: {}
    on-failure: []
    on-complete: []
    publish: {}
    inputs:
      applicationId:
        $:ref: $inputs.CIM_Application_Name
      patchValues:
        dlfa.is-execution-in-progress: "True"
      restrictions:
        groups:
          operation: append
          value: []
        users:
          operation: append
          value: []
      trackingId: '{ $:ref: $actions.Extract_Meta_Data.result.cim_tracking_id }'
      applicationName: ""
      removeValues: {}
      appendValues: {}
    recordActionType: patch
    inputSchemaReferenceId: d03476e8-a084-470b-b9a8-e11bd08ecd82
    meta: {}
    delay: 0
    pool: ""
    post: {}
    timeout: 0
meta: {}
title: component_aX_9QIxpUeCbCOxuY_playbook
description: ""
namespace: $default
entrypoints:
- Extract_Meta_Data
pool: ""
timeout: 0
publish: {}
environment: {}
inputs:
  type: object
  properties:
    CIM_Application_Name:
      type: string
      title: CIM Application Name
    Record_Values:
      type: object
      title: Record Values
  required:
  - CIM_Application_Name
  - Record_Values
triggers: {}
